description: Here's what you might have missed Wednesday on CNN
title: Quickly catch up on the day's news
title_page: Quickly catch up on the day's news - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Here's what you might have missed Wednesday on CNN:
-- New York Gov. Cuomo started his daily news conference by saying he had both good and bad news to report. While data shows that social distancing is helping to flatten the curve, New York's death toll is still going up. Yesterday, 779 people died across the state â€” the highest single-day death toll yet.
-- Sen. Bernie Sanders ended his presidential campaign, clearing Joe Biden's path to the Democratic nomination and a showdown with President Trump in November.
-- US intelligence officials were warning as far back as late November that coronavirus was spreading through China's Wuhan region and posing a threat to its people and daily life.
